details:
Encrypted code offering massive sending Instagram followers.

1) besides of using some shady services to achieve the goal, it also exfiltrates saved Instagram credentials to a remote server;
2) the project page offers selling an "exploit" for Instagram servers


---

Category: MALICIOUS - The campaign has clearly malicious intent, like infostealers.
Campaign: 2025-07-imad213tools
Reasons (based on the campaign):
 - exfiltration_credentials
 - other
 - obfuscation
